name: Alif Ramdani
role: Software Engineer | Scalable & Distributed Systems Specialist
description: 4+ years crafting high-performance, reliable and scalable microservices.
about: Seasoned software engineer with 4+ years of experience architecting and building highly scalable and reliable microservice and distributed systems. Expert in Go/Golang, TypeScript, PostgreSQL, Redis, Kafka, Docker, and Kubernetes. Hands-on experience in AI-driven solutions, including statistical forecasting models for sales prediction and inventory optimization, as well as MCP-based tools for intelligent workflow automation.
